monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Breaks hidden walls - Cuts through vines
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Shield by 30% of the damage dealt to enemies by critical hits. Increases critical chance by 7%.

skills.name: Aging
skills.description: At the end of its turn, this Monster gains an Age stack.

skills.name: Air Sickle
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Assault Shield
skills.description: Shield by 30% of the damage dealt to enemies by critical hits. Increases critical chance by 7%.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Blessing
skills.description: Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party Applies Sidekick (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Blessing Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party Applies Sidekick (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Blessing Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Glory & Sidekick (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Blizzard
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Chill (Debuff).

skills.name: Claws
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 130% (390%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 5
skills.description: 4 x 120% (480%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Cooling
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Chill.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Consistency
skills.description: +10% Critical Damage. Critical Damage also increases non-Critical hits by 10% of the amount.

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Critical Freeze
skills.description: The first critical hit of an ability applies Chill (Debuff).

skills.name: Critical Hybridization
skills.description: The first critical hit of a physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 60% of Magic value and vice versa.

skills.name: Double Impact
skills.description: When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, trigger an additional 50% damage hit.

skills.name: Earth Weakness
skills.description: Earth damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Equipment Mastery
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.

skills.name: Flash Freeze
skills.description: Trigger an additional 100% damage hit when applying Chill (Debuff) with an attack.

skills.name: Gale
skills.description: 1 x 165% magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Gale Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Gale Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Glory
skills.description: Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Gravity
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies - Base Damage is increased by 2 x 10% for every health and defense rating of the target

skills.name: Health Focus
skills.description: Health values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Hunt
skills.description: Aura: Increases the Critical Chance of the whole party by 4%.

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Ice Hail
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Hail Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Hail Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 70% (280%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Hail Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Hail Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Ice Spear Volley
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Ice Spear Volley Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Ice Spears
skills.description: 3 x 90% (270%) physical damage (water) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Ice Spears Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 85% (340%) physical damage (water) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Ice Spears Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 85% (425%) physical damage (water) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Ice Storm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Improved Glory
skills.description: Unique Aura: Glory (Buff) increases Critical damage by an additional 20%.

skills.name: Improved Sidekick
skills.description: Unique Aura: Sidekick (Buff) damage increased by an additional 50%.

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Lifesteal
skills.description: Heal by 15% of the damage dealt to enemies.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Symbiosis
skills.description: Regenerate 5 Mana for each heal received.  (Triggers on any Healing effect)

skills.name: Multi Chill
skills.description: Aura: Chill (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Offense
skills.description: Aura: Sidekick (Buff) and Glory (Buff) can be stacked one additional time. Additional stacks of Sidekick have only a 50% chance to trigger.

skills.name: Outlast
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster gain their first, second, or third Age stack, they also gain a shield equal to 15% of their Max Health.

skills.name: Primal Rage
skills.description: Increases the damage dealt by 5% and additional 5% for every Age stack.

skills.name: Shatter
skills.description: Unique Aura: Chill causes attacks against enemies affected by it to have 10% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Spectral Flame
skills.description: 3 x 70% (210%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 90% (270%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 80% (320%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 4
skills.description: 4 x 105% (420%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 105% (525%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Typhoon Cut
skills.description: 6 x 90% (540%) physical damage (wind) applies Glory, Sidekick & Agility (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%
